Chinese.name: 自建CDN刷新
Chinese.description: 监听COS桶上传事件，代理转发刷新请求（仅支持腾讯自建CDN业务）
Chinese.attention: 需要先通过CDN运维开通刷新权限，获取刷新密钥后才可使用本函数

English.name: ZjCdnRefresh
English.description: Listen to COS bucket upload events, proxy forward refresh requests (only supports Tencent self-built CDN business)
English.attention: Need to first open refresh permissions through CDN operation, get refresh key to use this function
